about_the_game:
Before The Story Lighthaze World is a prequel game. You will play and puzzle your way through a smaller version of Lighthaze World. These are separate puzzles and different levels to the puzzles and levels in the full game.

In this Demo you will play as Nym and follow your best friend Chewy, your dog, to try and find a way to Lighthaze World. While this is a thought out puzzle game, it was designed to be wholesome and relaxing, not stressful! Some puzzles are similar to sokoban other puzzles are sequenced based, all the puzzles are logic based.

All the levels are handcrafted lowpoly design, these levels are nature immersive inspired by The Tasmanian wilderness!
detailed_description:
Before The Story Lighthaze World is a prequel game. You will play and puzzle your way through a smaller version of Lighthaze World. These are separate puzzles and different levels to the puzzles and levels in the full game.

In this Demo you will play as Nym and follow your best friend Chewy, your dog, to try and find a way to Lighthaze World. While this is a thought out puzzle game, it was designed to be wholesome and relaxing, not stressful! Some puzzles are similar to sokoban other puzzles are sequenced based, all the puzzles are logic based.

All the levels are handcrafted lowpoly design, these levels are nature immersive inspired by The Tasmanian wilderness!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Quad Core 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: M1 Octa Core

  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X

name: Lighthaze World Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Dual
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: Before The Story- Lighthaze World, is a prequel game. This demo is is for all the cozy puzzle people. If you enjoy exploring and collecting, in a nature environment, play as Nym and find your way to Lighthaze World!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
